channel.title: (First RS Model Release) Ancient Blade
channel.description:
Well tbh, Runescape modeling is different from anything I've ever done before o.o, so here is my first model, probably not completed, but it took me a day to get it down. Really sucks you can't use image unwrapping but oh well. If there is something wrong with it tell me.
BTW, i dont have a server, is there another way for me to get a feel of how it fits on the character, I was doing all my scale estimations by a stupid pickaxe <.<. If you can give me a game size Player model that I can judge stuff on by, I would be much appreciated.
Oh I Hope I Did This Right.
Vertz:241 Facez:741
"Weild" Model http://www.mediafire.com/?kgqkw4nmrtjfdoq
"Drop" Model http://www.mediafire.com/?vznrcdnemzmc22a
ScreenShots [img]http://imagenic.net/images/6kquwltjowhogynj92nc.jpg[/img]
[img]http://imagenic.net/images/jkpdc69es2rn02vc06n.jpg[/img]
[img]http://imagenic.net/images/z4memp3zixb55vl17b2q.jpg[/img]

item.title: (First RS Model Release) Ancient Blade
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

See those white faces? That’s because you have faces going into one another at weird angles. Basically what I’m saying is that your wireframe is messy. And no offense, but the colors look like colors you would puke up. Like brighten up the yellow and brown and red weren’t supposed to be mixed that way

Read full topic

item.title: (First RS Model Release) Ancient Blade
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

the wanderer:

Ewwy. Don’t like the colors and the faces shouldn’t go into each other.

Can you please help me on this topic, i’m still stuck. Thank-you.
